Help.Name: Long_P1
Help.Title: Awoken
Help.Text: [color=#9e6404]Eruption: [/color] Floor Dragon causes eruption of underground water veins, dealing damage to target and turning the area into shallow water. [color=#9e6404]Equable Charge: [/color] Floor Dragon draws power from ancient water and summons thunder strikes to deal damage to target. [color=#9e6404]Call of the Herd: [/color] Uses dragon might to force nearby animals to attack. [color=#9e6404]Water Compaction: [/color] If Floor Dragon's พลังชี่ drops to 75% or less, it will absorb all water and steam from the location to stack the Power of Water Spirit and transform into True Dragon.

Help.Name: Long_P2
Help.Title: True Dragon
Help.Text: [color=#9e6404]Eruption: [/color] Floor Dragon causes eruption of underground water veins, dealing damage to target and turning the area into shallow water. [color=#9e6404]Equable Charge: [/color] Floor Dragon draws power from ancient water and summons thunder strikes to deal damage to multiple targets. [color=#9e6404]Dragon's Inhalation: [/color] Floor Dragon breathes in deeply to accelerate the water consumption of all enemies in the map and stack the Power of Water Spirit for itself. [color=#9e6404]Countercharge: [/color] Floor Dragon marks a character for a period of time, after which the character's artifact will countercharge with half of its ค่าพลังชี่สูงสุด, dealing great damage to all characters within 5 space of the marked unit. If Floor Dragon is counteractive with the artifact's element, the effect will double. Otherwise, it will be reduced to half. [color=#9e6404]Call of the Herd: [/color] Uses dragon might to force nearby animals to attack. [color=#9e6404]Sanguine Absorption: [/color] Floor Dragon refines all corpses in the area for recovery and to stack the Power of Water Spirit.

Help.Name: Long_Secret
Help.Title: Secrets
Help.Text: [color=#9e6404]Water Form: [/color] Floor Dragon is of Water element, more susceptible to Earth damage, less to Water damage and even less to Fire damage. Metal damage will be absorbed. [color=#9e6404]Dragon Wrath: [/color] If the rainstorm is dissipated, Floor Dragon will consume a great amount of Power of Water Spirit to enter a state of fury, causing an increase in all stats for 120 sec. After Dragon Wrath, Floor Dragon will resummon a rainstorm and deal great damage to the character that dissipated the previous rainstorm. If Floor Dragon is counteractive with the character's stats, the effect will double. Otherwise, it will be reduced to half. [color=#9e6404]Cold Prison: [/color] If one part of Floor Dragon's body is destroyed, it will exhale a freezing cold breath toward the location of the character that destroyed the part. Affected by the breath, the area will remain extremely cold for months. [color=#9e6404]Inundated Land: [/color] When the Power of Water Spirit reaches 100 stacks, Floor Dragon will use the destructive power to eliminate all creatures within its attack range and turn the whole area into water. [color=#9e6404]True Dragon's Claw: [/color] In True Dragon's form, Floor Dragon's claw will be shielded by the power of True Dragon and become indestructible. [color=#9e6404]Dragon Barrier: [/color] Floor Dragon is born with a protection barrier that keeps its body parts from being destroyed. Only when it is in rage mode, its protection barrier will focus on its core and the other parts will weaken. [color=#9e6404]Dragon's Prismatic Scale: [/color] Floor Dragon will show its Prismatic Scale only after releasing Dragon Wrath for three times.

Help.Name: Feng_P1
Help.Title: Firestruck
Help.Text: [color=#9e6404]Iridescent Flame: [/color] ฟินิกซ์ blows blazing flames, continuously dealing damage to target with a chance of lighting up nearby ground. [color=#9e6404]Fuse: [/color] ฟินิกซ์ marks a character for a period of time, and when it ends, deals huge damage to the area within 2 space of the character, distributed evenly to all creatures in the area. If ฟินิกซ์ is counteractive with the marked character's stats, damage increases by 200%. [color=#9e6404]Firekeeper: [/color] ฟินิกซ์ breathes in deeply to absorb all fire in the location, recovering พลังชี่ and gaining the Power of Fire Spirit based on the amount of absorbed fire. [color=#9e6404]Fire Eruption: [/color] When the Power of Fire Spirit reaches 100 stacks, ฟินิกซ์ will enter the Inferno form and risk its life to release 16 Feathers of Fire Spirit for attack.

Help.Name: Feng_P2
Help.Title: Inferno Form
Help.Text: [color=#9e6404]Inferno Hold[/color] ฟินิกซ์ continues to consume the Power of Fire Spirit to maintain its Inferno form. When all Power of Fire Spirit is consumed, ฟินิกซ์ will return to its original form and try to retrieve Feathers of Fire Spirit, each of which helps to recover 10% of its พลังชี่. [color=#9e6404]Inferno Breath[/color] ฟินิกซ์ blows out flames in an arc, dealing damage to characters in the area with a chance of lighting up the ground. [color=#9e6404]Flame Fuse: [/color] ฟินิกซ์ marks all Metal cultivators for a period of time, and when it ends, deals huge damage to the area within 2 space of the character, distributed evenly to all creatures in the area. If ฟินิกซ์ is counteractive with the marked character's stats, damage increases by 200%. If there is no Metal cultivator, it will mark a random character to release Flame Fuse upon. [color=#9e6404]Firekeeper: [/color] ฟินิกซ์ breathes in deeply to absorb all fire in the location, recovering พลังชี่ and gaining the Power of Fire Spirit based on the amount of absorbed fire. [color=#9e6404]Sun Crystal: [/color] ฟินิกซ์ risks its life to release the essence of fire, raising the temperature of the whole area in an attempt to burn the place to ashes.

Help.Name: Feng_Secret
Help.Title: Secrets
Help.Text: [color=#9e6404]Fire Form: [/color] ฟินิกซ์ is of Fire element, more susceptible to Water damage, less to Fire damage and even less to Metal damage. Wood damage will be absorbed. [color=#9e6404]Enraged ฟินิกซ์[/color] When it rains, ฟินิกซ์ will enter its rage mode and stop all actions to immediately release Firestruck to nearby ground three times in a row. Deals great damage to all enemies in the area. Firestruck targets areas with more Fire and Water element first. ฟินิกซ์ will immediately release Firekeeper after Enraged ฟินิกซ์ and then dissipate clouds, maintaining the sunny weather for a period of time. [color=#9e6404]Burning Pupil[/color] If one part of ฟินิกซ์'s body is destroyed, it will focus its power of true fire on releasing Burning Pupil to stare at the character that destroyed the part, dealing increasingly higher damage. And ฟินิกซ์'s body will weaken for its lack of defense during the attack. [color=#9e6404]Nirvana[/color] Dead ฟินิกซ์ will be transformed into ฟินิกซ์ Egg and try to absorb พลังชี่ within 49 days in order to be reborn. During this period, if the ฟินิกซ์ Egg exhausts its พลังชี่, the ฟินิกซ์ will completely die. If it fully recharges its พลังชี่, the ฟินิกซ์ will be reborn. It will also die if the Egg fails to absorb enough พลังชี่ within 49 days. [color=#9e6404]Wings of Fire Spirit[/color] In the Firestruck form, ฟินิกซ์' wings are protected by Feathers of Fire Spirit and thus nearly indestructible. The wings can only be destroyed after it has released Feathers of Fire Spirit in its Inferno form. [color=#9e6404]Sun Crystal: [/color] ฟินิกซ์' Sun Crystal is the essence of all of its great power, and only Water artifacts can deal damage to it.

Help.Name: ZhuLong
Help.Title: มังกรประทีป

Help.Name: ZhuLong_P1
Help.Title: Eternal Day
Help.Text: [color=#9e6404]God of Eternal Day: [/color] มังกรประทีป shows up in its Yang form and gains one stack of Solarflare Breath every 6 sec. Solarflare Breath will be transformed to an equal amount of Lunarfrost Breath after form switch. [color=#9e6404]Thunder of Impiety: [/color] มังกรประทีป unleashes its divine power to call upon Yang thunder filled with hatred to deal damage to target and temporarily increase target's ความชั่ว by 2. The higher the target's ความชั่ว, the greater the damage. [color=#9e6404]Dragon Breath: [/color] มังกรประทีป blows a heavy dragon breath toward one direction, attaching a Benign Dragon Avatar and dealing damage to every enemy touched by the breath. The higher the target's ความชั่ว, the greater the damage. [color=#9e6404]Heavenly Judgement: [/color] Releases upon target with the lowest ความชั่ว and deals great damage. If target's ความชั่ว is higher than 50, they will be heavily injured and lose control over their พลังชี่. Uncontrolled พลังชี่ will explode, deal damage to targets within 3 space, and eventually be absorbed by มังกรประทีป into 20 stacks of Solarflare Breath. [color=#9e6404]Karmic Transformation: [/color] When Solarflare Breath reaches 100 stacks, it will unleash the manifestations of karma force and attach Benign Dragon Avatar to all inner disciples. [color=#9e6404]Yin Yang Rage: [/color] When มังกรประทีป's egg is destroyed, it will disrupt the rule of Yin and Yang, deal damage to all enemies and hatch all Eggs of Yang that have not been suppressed. It will then fly into the air, create three Eggs of Yin and reappear in its Eternal Night form. During the form switch, มังกรประทีป will gain 50 stacks of Lunarfrost Breath, and all the debuffs of ความชั่ว caused by Thunder of Impiety will be cleared. [color=#9e6404]Benign Dragon Avatar: [/color] Phantom shadow created by มังกรประทีป in its Eternal Day form. Continuously recovers พลังชี่ for มังกรประทีป. The avatar's พลังชี่ and spell power are related to the character's ความชั่ว when the avatar is created. The higher the target's ความชั่ว, the greater the พลังชี่ and spell power. [color=#9e6404]Egg of Yang: [/color] When releasing Yin Yang Rage, มังกรประทีป will hatch all Eggs of Yang in the area, creating a huge threat that is Dragon's Servant. Egg of Yang can only be suppressed with ลางร้ายมาก Feng Shui.

Help.Name: ZhuLong_P2
Help.Title: Eternal Night
Help.Text: [color=#9e6404]God of Eternal Night: [/color] มังกรประทีป shows up in its Yin form and gains one stack of Lunarfrost Breath every 6 sec. Lunarfrost Breath will be transformed to an equal amount of Solarflare Breath after form switch. [color=#9e6404]Thunder of Divinity: [/color] มังกรประทีป unleashes its divine power to call upon Yin thunder filled with divine will to deal damage to target and temporarily reduce target's Mental State by 2. The lower the target's Mental State, the greater the damage. [color=#9e6404]Demon Dragon Breath: [/color] มังกรประทีป blows a heavy dragon breath toward one direction, attaching a Malignant Dragon Avatar and dealing damage to every enemy touched by the breath. The lower the target's Mental State, the greater the damage. [color=#9e6404]Evil Abyss: [/color] Releases upon target with the highest Mental State and deals great damage. If target's Mental State is lower than 30, they will be heavily injured and lose control over their พลังชี่. Uncontrolled พลังชี่ will explode, deal damage to targets within 3 space, and eventually be absorbed by มังกรประทีป into 20 stacks of Lunarfrost Breath. [color=#9e6404]Demon Shapeshifting: [/color] When Lunarfrost Breath reaches 100 stacks, it will unleash the manifestations of demonic force and attach Malignant Dragon Avatar to all inner disciples. [color=#9e6404]Yin Yang Rage: [/color] When มังกรประทีป's egg is destroyed, it will disrupt the rule of Yin and Yang, deal damage to all enemies and hatch all Eggs of Yin that have not been suppressed. It will then fly into the air, create three Eggs of Yang and reappear in its Eternal Day form. During the form switch, มังกรประทีป will gain 50 stacks of Solarflare Breath, and all the debuffs of Mental State caused by Thunder of Divinity will be cleared. [color=#9e6404]Malignant Dragon Avatar: [/color] Phantom shadow created by มังกรประทีป in its Eternal Night form. Releases artifacts to attack its enemy. The avatar's พลังชี่ and spell power are related to the character's Mental State when the avatar is created. The lower the target's Mental State, the greater the พลังชี่ and spell power. [color=#9e6404]Egg of Yin: [/color] When releasing Yin Yang Rage, มังกรประทีป will hatch all Eggs of Yin in the area, creating a huge threat that is Dragon's Servant. Egg of Yin can only be suppressed with ฤกษ์ดีมาก Feng Shui.

Help.Name: ZhuLong_Secret
Help.Title: Secrets
Help.Text: [color=#9e6404]Yin Yang Form: [/color] มังกรประทีป is the manifestation of Yin and Yang in the Mortal Realm. In its Eternal Day form, only Yin elements like Metal and Water can deal damage to it, and it absorbs damage from Yang elements like Fire and Wood. In its Eternal Night form, only Yang elements like Fire and Wood can deal damage to it, and it absorbs damage from Yin elements like Metal and Water. Earth element ignores its form but only deals a small amount of damage. [color=#9e6404]Rage of the Creed of Heaven—Mind Shielding: [/color] When its eye is destroyed in Eternal Night, มังกรประทีป will call upon Rage of the Creed of Heaven to create Mind Shielding for the character that destroyed the eye, reducing their Mental State by 100 for a year. If the character survives Mind Shielding, their Mental State will permanently increase by 20. [color=#9e6404]Rage of the Creed of Heaven—Inferno of Karma: [/color] When its eye is destroyed in Eternal Day, มังกรประทีป will call upon Rage of the Creed of Heaven to create Inferno of Karma for the character that destroyed the eye, increasing their ความชั่ว by 1,000 for a year. If the character survives Inferno of Karma, their ความชั่ว will permanently reduce by 200. [color=#9e6404]Heavenly Scale: [/color] There is a Heavenly Scale between มังกรประทีป's eyebrows that only shows up after it has released Yin Yang Rage twice. [color=#9e6404]Chaos Jade: [/color] Chaos Jade is the source of มังกรประทีป's power that only shows up between the eyebrows after its eyes and Heavenly Scale are destroyed.
